mainText.attr1: Sensor Contact List:
Lost something? Try the sensor contact list.
Key Concepts:
Hidden by default - see image on right.
Categorized by object type.
Colorized by object faction.
Ordered by - last added - on the bottom.
Has all objects in the sector.
Except mines and missiles.
Other object category contains:
Asteroids, cargo pods, gates and debris.
Look through the list.
Click on desired object to select.
Double click to focus camera on object.
See the newly built enemy ships
Look at bottom of the ship category
Locate hard to find objects.
For example - cargo pods after a battle
History/Behind the scenes:

The Sensor Contact list was added very early in development. I added it because I had a hard time finding objects - back when maps were quite a bit larger (but more empty). It was always visible by default - then as it became less useful - I decided to hide it by default so that it doesn't obscure the view - unless wanted.
